newsitem.title: USA: Lear Corp offering priced at $40/shr.
newsitem.headline: Lear Corp offering priced at $40/shr.

text.p: Lear Corp, a supplier of automotive interior products, said Wednesday a public offering of 10.3 million shares in the company was priced at $40.
The stock is being sold by the company's largest shareholder, certain merchant banking partnerships affiliated with Lehman Brothers Holdings, the company said.
Upon completion of the offering, the merchant banking partnerships affiliated with Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc will no longer be a shareholder in Lear, the company said.
Lear shares were up 2-1/16 at 42-1/16 Wednesday.
